Storm Beast.name: Storm Beast
Storm Beast.flavor: With a great roar, you channel the fury of a primal storm. Lightning dances around you and strikes your enemies.
Storm Beast.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.

Storm Child.name: Storm Child
Storm Child.flavor: For a short time, you become a child of storms. Thunder booms as lightning crackles around you, launching at your enemies.
Storm Child.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can use the Storm Child Attack power once per round, either in your humanoid form or in your beast form.
Storm Child.requirement: You must have the Storm Child power activated to use this power.

Shield of Gales.name: Shield of Gales
Shield of Gales.flavor: A funnel cloud forms around you, knocking aside your enemies and shielding you from harm.
Shield of Gales.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses. When any enemy ends its turn adjacent to you, you can slide that enemy 1 square as a free action.
